GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of article objects, sorted in descending order of date

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for the given article_id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment for given article_id with new comment_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a given comment by comment_id
